channel.title: Open Saus
channel.description: Dugan is a green, foodie, hipster, brogramming, loonie Portlander.

item.title: Building this Blog.
item.description: For the first code post on my shiny new blog, what is more appropriate then talking about the tech behind this blog? I wanted something hackable and flexible, but easy to write and deploy.

item.title: My Essential 5 Hot Sauces
item.description: Hot sauce runs through my veins. Also beer and coffee, but those are topics for another day. As my intoductory post on opensa.us, Iâ€™ll keep it simple and stick to my essentials for keeping my food saucy. The first on the list is an outstanding homemade sauce, and the rest are store bought:
